New Manchester pub reviews

Ring O' Bells

Middleton

Reviewed by ROB Camra on 08 October 2019

Found it open on this visit. It's up a bit of a hill and facing St. Stephens, hence the name. The main room is split into two by a partial wall and there's also a small pool room to the rear. It's all old beams almost throughout with loads of bric-a-... [more>]

The Pilcrow

Reviewed by Danny O'Revey on 08 October 2019

A bit bizarre, looks like it may be a temporary builders hut (Auf Wiedersehen?) for adjoining high rise developments & has been left. Little character inside but does sell real ale. Close to Victoria Station
